descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Brandon Goodwin drains a basket for the Hawks, and Miles Bridges responds by inbounding a very long pass on the money to LaMelo Ball for the lay-in on the other end.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bridges airs a pass across the court to LaMelo for a lay-in) 2020/1/6 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bridges airs a pass across the court to LaMelo for a lay-in

videos.description: Gordon Hayward helps pad the Hornets' lead over the Hawks with a couple of second-quarter dunks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hayward gets a pair of second-quarter dunks) 2020/1/6 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hayward gets a pair of second-quarter dunks

videos.description: Devonte' Graham throws ahead to Terry Rozier, who scores a nice reverse bucket while drawing the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Rozier scores incredible reverse and-1) 2020/1/6 ESHEET

videos.headline: Rozier scores incredible reverse and-1
